Enrique Comba Riepenhausen Thoughts of a restless mind

Talks

I have given a number of talks over the years. Some have been recorded some haven't. For some of them I have the slides, for others I don't...

Here I am trying to compile together the talks I have given in the past and sharing them with you.

  • Mushin no shin (22nd of August 2014) - During this lightning talk I spoke about the concept of the mind that is no mind during the Makers Academy Talks Night.
  • Agile and XP Basics (21st of October 2013) - Introductory session ran at Makers Academy.
  • The Impersonator Pattern (4th of April 2013) - A talk about a better approach to writing cucumber step definitions and features given at Skills Matter during the Cuke Up! 2013 event.
  • Facilitating the Day of Global Code Retreat in Costa Rica (8th of December 2011)
  • TEDx Zaragoza (5th of November 2011)
  • Facilitating a Code Retreat in Valladolid (7th of May 2011)
  • Don't build another Tower of Babel! (7th - 9th of April 2011) Scottish Ruby Conference
  • Facilitating a Code Retreat in Winchester (12th of March 2011)
  • Agile Coaches Gathering Madrid (4th of February 2011)
  • DevOpenMadrid (8th of January 2011)
  • 15en5, Madrid (7th of January 2011)
  • Coding Dojo, Madrid (4th of January 2011)
  • AOS 2010, Barcelona (12th - 13th of November 2010)
  • The Forsaken Value, Software Craftsmanship North America (14th - 16th of October 2010)
